Get a specific conversation with all messages for the user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Full conversation with messages.","properties":{"conversation_id":{"title":"Conversation Id","type":"string"},"created_at":{"format":"date-time","title":"Created At","type":"string"},"messages":{"items":{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object"},"title":"Messages","type":"array"},"title":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Title"}},"required":["conversation_id","title","messages","created_at"],"title":"ConversationDetail","type":"object"}}},"description":"Successful Response"},"422":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"detail":{"items":{"properties":{"loc":{"items":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer"}]},"title":"Location","type":"array"},"msg":{"title":"Message","type":"string"},"type":{"title":"Error Type","type":"string"}},"required":["loc","msg","type"],"title":"ValidationError","type":"object"},"title":"Detail","type":"array"}},"title":"HTTPValidationError","type":"object"}}},"description":"Validation Error"}}}
